mapper.delete: delete from comm_user_list where comm_num=#{comm_num} and user_num=#{user_num}
mapper.update: update comm_user_list set cul_status=-1 where user_num=#{user_num} and comm_num=#{comm_num}
mapper.select: select nvl(max(cul_status),0) from comm_user_list where comm_num=#{comm_num} and user_num=#{user_num}
